pages.text: EMI has a lot of features and is what you will primarily use for recipes throughout your journey. $(br2)You can search through every item in the modpack using the search bar at the bottom of your inventory screen.

Items appear at the right side of the screen and can be clicked on to view their recipes. You can also hover over an item and hit the U key on your keyboard (by default) to view items that can be crafted from it.

pages.title: Item View
pages.text: When viewing recipes for an item, tabs near the top of the screen will show you different methods of crafting/obtaining it. For example, Wool has a tab on how to craft it at a crafting table, a tab on how to wash or pack it with Create machinery, and a tab on how to trade for it with villagers.

pages.title: Recipe Tree
pages.text: Some late game recipes can get a bit complicated. When viewing a recipe in EMI, you can press the little View Recipe Tree button to its right to see the whole chain of crafting steps and a total cost.
